about_the_game:
t's a game where you create pudding with mouse clicks and clear the stage. If you clear stage 10, the clear screen will pop up and it's over

story

The night sky was deep and still. The city lights dimly covered the stars, but some stars were still shining stubbornly. Pudding asked himself, looking at the stars, "Where am I from, and where am I going?"

He loved space since he was a child. He dreamed of seeing the stars and his goal was to become an astronomer who unravels the secrets of space. But by the time he reached his 30s, space was becoming more distant and like a giant enemy. "We're just dust after all," Pudding said often during conversations with his friends. "The universe doesn't care about us. We're done when it's gone."

Then one day, Pudding had a strange experience in her dream. A voice came through the infinite darkness. "Have you forgotten that you are part of the universe?"

At that moment, he felt his body disintegrate in his dream. His hands turned to soil, his feet to water, and his head to air. Then the soil turned back to wood, water to clouds, and the air to the bird's breath. He was now part of a tree, stretched out his roots, and part of a cloud, drifting through the sky, and falling to the ground in rain. In the endless stream of circulation, he realized, "I'm not dust, I'm everything."

After that day, Pudding stopped seeing the universe as hostile. He no longer felt the universe like a great enemy. Rather, he realized that it was part of the larger being that formed him

name: 10run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 86 MB available space

short_description: It's a game that removes characters by creating pudding
